<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>b28d592b-83e8-42c5-8a81-932b2c73f147#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Lajhármaki</string>
            <string language="en">Slow loris</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Langsame loris</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Loris lents</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Loris lentos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Loris lenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αργά loris</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Loris lentos</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A főemlősök közé tartozik. Fán lakó, éjszakai életmódú. Az ázsiai trópusi erdők lakója.</string>
            <string language="en">Belongs to the primates. Living on trees, nightly lifestyled. Inhabitant of Asian tropical forests.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">emlősök,  főemlősök,  méhlepényesek,  félmajom,  maki,  </string>
            <string language="en">mammals, the primates, placentalia, lemur, lemur</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gehört den Primas. Lebend auf Bäumen, 
lifestyled allabendlich. Einwohner der asiatischen tropischen 
Wälder.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Appartient aux primats. Vivant sur des 
arbres, lifestyled de nuit. Habitant des forêts tropicales 
asiatiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pertence aos primatas. Vivendo em árvores, 
lifestyled nightly. Habitante de florestas tropicais asian.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Appartiene ai primati. Vivendo sugli alberi,
lifestyled nightly. Abitante delle foreste tropicali asiatiche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανήκει στους αρχιεπισκόπους. Ζωντανός στα 
δέντρα, κάθε βράδυ. Κάτοικος των ασιατικών τροπικών 
δασών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pertenece a los primates. Viviendo en 
árboles, lifestyled cada noche. Habitante de bosques tropicales
asiáticos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Säugetiere, die Primas, placentalia, lemur, lemur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mammifères, les primats, placentalia, lemur, lemur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mamíferos, primatas, placentalia, lemur, lemur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mammiferi, i primati, placentalia, lemur, lemur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θηλαστικά, οι αρχιεπίσκοποι, placentalia, lemur, 
lemur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mamíferos, los primates, placentalia, lemur, lemur</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0

        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
